title: Banned for banter among the team
body:
So these are my comms for the last game I had, in which I was banned for 14 days. A little backstory, we were playing norms and I locked in teemo jungle. No big deal, we all started the game normally. I realised that we had a lee sin adc, and questioned him about it but didn't continue with any insults or harrassment. A bit of banter as I continued through my first clear, after which I ganked bot and taxed their lane for a bit. My botlaners decided to call me out and start taking my camps, of course in a playful and hilarious matter. So we decided that since they are winning lane hard we would rush to see who could clear the camps the fastest, as they were always there to take them. 

I told them to be useful and take scuttle if they're gonna take my camps, in which they replied no and started taking the enemy jungle. I asked why, as I thought they were only taking mine and they said the "price of taxing our lane has increased" (not exact words) and started taking more camps. I got annoyed when they started taking my buffs, and told them to go away (of course, I really couldn't care less. It was all playful and I didn't mean any insults towards them in any way.) The enemy team said their twitch did no damage, so I said "it's cause he's 0/10" and started getting fucked by the enemy azir. This continued to the end of the game and I got banned afterwards.

Another reminder, my "insults" and "disrespectful language" towards my 2 botlaners was completely for jokes and banter and I didn't mean it at all.

Comms Below \/ \/ \/

Excalibyte: fast as fuck

Excalibyte: cuck off
Excalibyte: shh
Excalibyte: still
Excalibyte: do it then
Excalibyte: pussy
Excalibyte: be useful and take skuttle
Excalibyte: jesus
Excalibyte: thought you said my jungle
Excalibyte: ???
Excalibyte: gtfo
Excalibyte: 3 camps
Excalibyte: there
Excalibyte: lmao
Excalibyte: 2 for 1

Excalibyte: kurgs?
Excalibyte: uh

replies.body: Deserved punishment learn from it and move on.

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=0iszEmfd,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-09-29T11:29:04.375+0000)
>
> Deserved punishment learn from it and move on.

please read my post before commenting. If you did read it, please go into detail on what I did wrong. Thanks in advance.

"Excalibyte: kys"

Instant punishment term. I did read it. Deserved punishment.

It's immediately obvious that your were punished (and harshly punished) for telling some of your fellow summoners to kill themselves. 

Even in a joking/banter context, there are some things **you just shouldn't say** when you are not in a 5man premade.  Racism, homophobia, **encouraging suicide/self harm**, and death threats are just some of those things. If you aren't in a full premade with friends you know won't take this seriously, you don't know how other people are going to react. 

Ultimately, it seems you exposed someone who didn't want to see that kind of stuff in their games to it and they decided to report you.

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=0iszEmfd,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-09-29T13:17:04.156+0000)
>
> It's immediately obvious that your were punished (and harshly punished) for telling some of your fellow summoners to kill themselves. 
> 
> Even in a joking/banter context, there are some things **you just shouldn't say** when you are not in a 5man premade.  Racism, homophobia, **encouraging suicide/self harm**, and death threats are just some of those things. If you aren't in a full premade with friends you know won't take this seriously, you don't know how other people are going to react. 
> 
> Ultimately, it seems you exposed someone who didn't want to see that kind of stuff in their games to it and they decided to report you.

Thank you, an actual answer. Thanks for putting the time into writing this, and it cleared up why I was banned. Thanks so much!
Banter....do you know what banter mean? There is a different between teasing and insulting; Like you have demonstrated above.

> [{quoted}](name=TheDemonEmperor,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=0iszEmfd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-29T11:17:50.327+0000)
>
> Banter....do you know what banter mean? There is a different between teasing and insulting; Like you have demonstrated above.

Again, if the comms from my 2 botlaners were shown, it's obvious that it was all playful and I did not mean to harm them in any way. Please read my statement above before commenting.

Yea? you mean you pissed them off and got reported leading to the ban; it is still banter to you? 

If it was just banter like you've said, you would'nt be reported and now banned.

> [{quoted}](name=TheDemonEmperor,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=0iszEmfd,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-09-29T12:27:01.516+0000)
>
> Yea? you mean you pissed them off and got reported leading to the ban; it is still banter to you? 
> 
> If it was just banter like you've said, you would'nt be reported and now banned.

I wish riot would tell you who reported you, because I believe the 2 botlaners didn't report me.

Excalibyte: kys
Riot is a bunch of pussies, this is an insta ban, same as %%%%%% and %%%g0t and last but not least; %%%%%%%%%got

oh wow. I just cried by how beautiful those words were. These words have just put a whole new meaning on life, thank you, kindred's hole.
